actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a $7,000 exemption from income tax for retirement benefits attributable to service performed as a police officer or firefighter.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income up to $7,000 of retirement benefits received by a police officer or firefighter under a public retirement system.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a $7,000 exemption from income tax for retirement benefits attributable to service performed as a police officer or firefighter.
